item.description:
For this second meeting of the year, the Public Radio eXchange (PRX) iPhone Development Team will be sharing with the meetup members the development approach and UI for the yet-to-be-released Public Radio Tuner 2.0. The 1.0 version is wildly successful. PRT is currently the most downloaded free app in the music category of the App Store and it has been consistently in the Top 10 free apps for the whole iTunes.
Come and learn about the many exciting challenges and opportunities that arise from creating the successor of one of the most popular iPhone apps of all times.

This meetup is open to all members, and it is a great opportunity for sharing notes and networking with other fellow iPhone enthusiasts/developers/marketers.

And did I mentioned that we will order super-yummy pizza from Upper Crust ?

Special thanks for PRX for providing the space for hosting this Meetup.

~Giuseppe
www.giuseppetaibi.com
www.smartworlds.com
item.name: The making of Public Radio Tuner 2.0 (most downloaded free music app)
